meaningMnemonic: What is the <kanji>color</kanji> of <kanji>tea</kanji>? You'd think it would be green, assuming it's Japanese... but this word came from China. What color is Chinese tea? It tends to be more <vocabulary>brown</vocabulary>. Think Oolong tea, for example.
readingMnemonic: The readings for both kanji are the readings you learned with the kanji, meaning you should be able to read this already.
